metadata.title: CVE-2024-21173 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:InnoDB).  Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.37 and prior and8.4.0 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privilegedattacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQLServer.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result inunauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash(complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Availabilityimpacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-8.0 package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
mariadb package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
